subtitle: We look forward to welcoming you

parking.title: Parking Information
parking.main_lot_detail: Free parking lot located east of the church building (150 spaces)
parking.overflow_detail: School parking lot across the street available on Sundays
parking.handicap_detail: Designated handicap spaces near the main entrance

public_transport.title: Public Transportation
public_transport.subway_detail: Centre Area Transportation Authority (CATA) bus service available
public_transport.bus_detail: Ample free parking available on site

nearby.title: Nearby Amenities
nearby.grocery: Korean Grocery: Available in Pittsburgh or Harrisburg areas
nearby.restaurant: Asian Restaurants: Several options in State College and surrounding areas
nearby.hospital: Hospital: Mount Nittany Medical Center (10 min drive)
